questions.question: Share a memory of a holiday. Where was it, who went, what happened?

answers.answer: I was go to Canada in 1984 for holidays. I have 19 years old ,, it was very fantastic! Peoples are very cool ! I have visited Montreal , Quebec and remonted the St Laurent just the Sagnay. I have make camping in the largest forests whive wilds animals: burns, eagles ....I have fisching in the wilds rivers and swimming in the lakes. I hope go to the Middle West in USA next time whive my wife. I like travels and holidays
